tests.testCase: Display BPO modules with stats and trends
tests.expected: Shows 6 module cards with dynamic stats and role-based filtering
tests.details: Module cards correctly display with stats, trends, and role filtering logic implemented

tests.expected: Different modules shown based on user role (head-office vs back-office)
tests.details: accessibleModules filter based on user role works correctly

tests.expected: Clicking modules navigates to respective pages
tests.details: onClick handler with window.location.href implemented for navigation

tests.expected: Different quick actions based on user role
tests.details: Conditional rendering of buttons based on userRole (head-office/back-office)

tests.expected: Shows key metrics with trend indicators
tests.details: keyMetrics array with trends and positive/negative indicators displayed

tests.expected: Files can be dragged and dropped into upload zone
tests.details: useDropzone with onDrop callback, accepts multiple file types (PDF, images, Excel)

tests.expected: Complete invoice form can be submitted with validation
tests.details: handleSubmit function with validation, creates BPO entity with smart codes

tests.expected: Shows list of uploaded files with status indicators
tests.details: uploadedFiles state with file preview, size, and status (pending/processing/success/error)

tests.expected: All form fields can be edited and state is updated
tests.details: formData state with onChange handlers for all input fields

tests.expected: Individual files can be removed before submission
tests.details: removeFile function filters out files by ID from uploadedFiles array

tests.expected: Required fields validated before submission
tests.details: Validation for invoice number, vendor name, total amount with alert feedback

tests.expected: Clear button resets entire form and uploaded files
tests.details: Clear Form button resets both formData state and uploadedFiles array

tests.expected: Shows realistic file processing with status updates
tests.details: Async processing simulation with status updates (processing â†’ success/error)

tests.expected: Shows list of invoices with multiple filter options
tests.details: mockInvoices array with comprehensive filtering (search, status, priority, assigned user)

tests.expected: Back office users can claim queued invoices
tests.details: claimInvoice function updates invoice with current user and in_progress status

tests.expected: Users can release claimed invoices back to queue
tests.details: releaseInvoice function removes assignment and resets to queued status

tests.expected: Shows SLA status with warnings and breaches
tests.details: getSLAStatus function with visual indicators for warning/breach/escalation states

tests.expected: Real-time statistics bar with counts
tests.details: Calculated stats object with counts for each status and SLA compliance

tests.expected: Multi-criteria filtering with search
tests.details: useEffect with complex filtering logic based on search term, status, priority, assignment

tests.expected: Invoices sorted by priority and SLA deadline
tests.details: Sort function with priority weighting and SLA deadline ordering

issues: No direct link to invoice detail view
Process button could be more functional

tests.expected: Users can compose and send messages in threads
tests.details: sendMessage function creates new message entity with proper metadata

tests.expected: Shows list of communication threads with unread counts
tests.details: mockThreads with participant info, unread counts, and last message display

tests.expected: Messages shown in chat interface with sender information
tests.details: Messages rendered with sender avatars, role badges, and timestamp

tests.expected: Clicking threads loads corresponding messages
tests.details: setSelectedThread updates active thread and message display

tests.expected: New messages appear immediately and scroll to bottom
tests.details: useEffect with messagesEndRef scrollIntoView for auto-scroll

tests.expected: Threads can be searched and filtered by status
tests.details: filteredThreads with search term matching and status filtering

tests.expected: Enter to send, Shift+Enter for new line
tests.details: onKeyDown handler with Enter/Shift+Enter logic in textarea

tests.expected: Shows key performance indicators with trend data
tests.details: mockKPIs object with totalInvoices, processing times, SLA compliance, quality metrics

tests.expected: Shows invoice distribution across different statuses
tests.details: statusBreakdown with percentage calculations and visual indicators

tests.expected: Individual team member statistics
tests.details: teamPerformance array with processed count, avg time, quality scores

tests.expected: Customer feedback and ratings display
tests.details: clientSatisfaction array with ratings and feedback comments

tests.expected: Toggle between Overview/Team/Clients views
tests.details: viewType state with conditional rendering of different dashboard sections

tests.expected: Filter data by different time periods
tests.details: dateRange state with select dropdown (1d, 7d, 30d, 90d options)

tests.expected: Historical trend data with visual charts
tests.details: Trend data arrays present but rendered as simple bars, could be enhanced with proper charts

issues: Charts are basic HTML bars, not interactive

tests.expected: Shows chronological list of all system transactions
tests.details: auditTrail array with comprehensive transaction history and smart codes

tests.expected: Shows SLA met/missed status for each transaction
tests.details: sla_met boolean with visual indicators and breach counting

tests.expected: Rich transaction information with metadata
tests.details: Each entry shows user, timing, processing duration, error details, quality notes

tests.expected: Filter by invoice, user, action type
tests.details: filteredAudit with search term, invoice ID, user ID, and action filtering

tests.expected: Summary metrics at top of page
tests.details: Real-time calculated stats for total events, SLA compliance, breaches, avg duration

tests.expected: Click to view detailed transaction information
tests.details: selectedTransaction state with modal display of full transaction details

tests.expected: Icons and colors for different transaction types
tests.details: getActionIcon and getActionColor functions with comprehensive mappings

issues: Modal could have more detailed information

tests.testCase: Display current settings across all categories
tests.expected: Shows profile, organization, notifications, SLA, security settings
tests.details: Multiple state objects for different setting categories with comprehensive options

tests.expected: All profile fields can be modified
tests.details: profileSettings state with onChange handlers for all input fields

tests.expected: Toggle switches work for notification settings
tests.details: notificationSettings with Switch components and onCheckedChange handlers

tests.expected: SLA timing and escalation settings can be adjusted
tests.details: slaSettings state with number inputs and boolean toggles

tests.expected: Security preferences and timeouts can be configured
tests.details: securitySettings state with comprehensive security options

tests.expected: Settings can be persisted with validation
tests.details: handleSave function exists but only simulates API call, no actual persistence

tests.expected: Smooth navigation between different settings sections
tests.details: activeTab state with conditional rendering and visual active indicators

tests.expected: Invalid settings are caught and user is notified
tests.details: Save status feedback exists but no field-level validation implemented

issues: No actual settings persistence to backend

recommendations: Implement backend persistence for Settings page
Add file attachment functionality to Communication Hub
Enhance Analytics charts with interactive features
Add export functionality for Audit Trail
Implement real-time updates across all pages
Add bulk operations for Work Queue
Improve form validation throughout the system
